member_organisations: ROEC does not have organizations as its members.
fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Trade, Competition, International co-operation and development, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Taxation, Single market, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, External Relations, Trans-European Networks, Digital economy and society
head_office_address: Calea Calarasilor No 319 A, ground floor, room 7
section: IV - Think tanks, research and academic institutions
membership: ROEC is not a member in any other association, (con)federation, network or body.
goals__remit:
Our mission is to engage Romanian and foreign energy professionals on various energy matters, to tackle analysis worthy topics that escape the radar of the public eye, to enrich the current understanding of SEE energy markets through a strong Romanian perspective. We do this by delivering sharp analytical products on topics that we deem to be of interest.  
ROEC contributes to important public debates about domestic energy and environmental policies, about Romania’s and EU’s energy security. ROEC supports a more investor-friendly business environment, more transparent energy governance, and increased awareness about the systemic interconnection of the energy issues.  
ROEC produces both business - and policy-oriented research and analysis, as well as academic papers, organizes public debates, round tables and conferences, and disseminates the results to interested parties.
